title: Cool Places
descriptionStart: Find and discover interesting places on the Eupener Straße campus!
descriptionEnd: Hopefully you have discovered places you didn't know before!

steps.text:
Can you imagine where you can find this?


![](cool_places/castle.png)


If you have found it, enter the name of the distinctive building you see here.

Not quite...


Hint: It is not a building in the traditional sense, but a distinctive structure. What is such a structure called?
To make sure you have found it, enter how many trees the avenue behind it has. Count all the trees in the two rows! (Even the ones at the very back)
You did it! You found the archway and counted the avenue. Incredible that such a beautiful place is hidden on the campus!

On to the next place!


Does this sign look familiar?


![](cool_places/sign_sculpture.png)


If you have found it, enter behind which building you find this sign.

Not quite...


Hint: You might have seen it during your lunch break.

What exactly is this thing?


![](cool_places/sculpture_table_1.png)


Well... look under the table from which this photo was taken and scan the QR code!

Oops... either you scanned the wrong table or something completely different.

Try again!

What exactly is this thing?


![](cool_places/sculpture_table_2.png)


Well... look under the table from which this photo was taken and scan the QR code!

Oops... either you scanned the wrong table or something completely different.

Try again!

What exactly is this thing?


![](cool_places/sculpture_table_3.png)


Well... look under the table from which this photo was taken and scan the QR code!

Oops... either you scanned the wrong table or something completely different.

Try again!
That's it for now! Hopefully you have discovered something new!
